Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.ambassador.spawning.flow

Class AbstractSpawningMode.DecreaseLinear

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.ambassador.spawning.flow.AbstractSpawningMode
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.ambassador.spawning.flow.AbstractSpawningMode.DecreaseLinear
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpawningMode
Enclosing class:
AbstractSpawningMode
public static class AbstractSpawningMode.DecreaseLinear extends AbstractSpawningMode
Decreases the flow of spawning vehicles linearly from the given target flow until the given end time as reached.

  • Constructor Details

    • DecreaseLinear

      public DecreaseLinear(RandomNumberGenerator rng, long start, double spawnsPerHour, Long end)
      Constructor for AbstractSpawningMode.DecreaseLinear.
      Parameters:
      start - the time at which spawning of vehicles should be started
      spawnsPerHour - the flow with which spawning is started (veh/hour)
      end - the time at which spawning should be ended. If not given, vehicles will be spawned forever but flow would not decrease anymore after 1800 seconds of spawning.
